HEB101.name: Elementary Hebrew I
HEB101.description: Spoken and written Hebrew for conversation, reading, and research. Basic grammatical analysis of modern Hebrew.

HEB102.name: Elementary Hebrew II
HEB102.description: Further work on spoken and written Hebrew for conversation, reading, and research. Further basic grammatical analysis of modern Hebrew.

HEB201.name: Second-Year Hebrew I
HEB201.description: Intermediate-level spoken and written Hebrew for conversation, reading, and research. Advanced grammatical analysis of modern Hebrew.

HEB202.name: Second-Year Hebrew II
HEB202.description: Further intermediate-level spoken and written Hebrew for conversation, reading, and research. Further advanced grammatical analysis of modern Hebrew.

HEB290.name: Independent Study
HEB290.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
HEB290.description: Special projects arranged by an individual student and a faculty member in areas supplementing regular course offerings.

HEB490.name: Independent Study
HEB490.semester: Fall of every year, Spring of every year, Summer of every year
HEB490.description: Special projects arranged by an individual student and a faculty member in areas supplementing regular course offerings.
HEB490.restrictions: Not open to sophomores. Approval of department.
